snippet.title: Evil Dead : Hail To The King | 4K | Full Game Longplay Walkthrough No Commentary
snippet.description:
Evil Dead : Hail To The King (Full Game Movie Walkthrough) Longplay Gameplay LetsPlay Playthrough. For PS1, emulated on PC in Widescreen @ 4K/60FPS.

** PB Horror Gaming. The Original Network for your Survival Horror Gaming needs **

P.B. Horror Gaming's Rating - ★★★½☆

□ Game Description □
"The game takes place eight years after the events of Army of Darkness. After regaining his job at S-Mart and beginning a new relationship with fellow employee Jenny,  Ash begins suffering from recurring nightmares about the Necronomicon and the Deadites, which haunt him for years. Wanting to help him, Jenny decides to take Ash back to Professor Knowby's old cabin to help him face his demons."

► Twitter - https://twitter.com/PB_HorrorGaming

Evil Dead : A Fistful of Boomstick Walkthrough LINK ► https://youtu.be/zm4GUOlVE6A
Evil Dead : Regeneration Walkthrough LINK ► https://youtu.be/QIHdkh40cZU

Developer - ‎Heavy Iron Studios.
Publisher - THQ.
Platform - PS1/Dreamcast/PC
Release - 2000.
